name: Scottys Mission Beach
description:
Unlimited Free WIFI -  - Closest to the Beach - Skydive/Rafting  - Central Location 

 Scottys Mission Beach ,Free WiFi, Discount ACCOM with every SKY DIVE and OVERNIGHT WHITSUNDAY SAILING booked with us, phone for great deals. Closest to the beach. Designated Skydive and White-water Rafting pick up location., Ensuite Rooms, Plus much more! Everything you need to make the most of your Mission Beach Experience.

Mission Beach's Adventure Capital!! Designated Skydive & Rafting pick-up location. 

Skydive - Rafting - Island Tours - Snorkeling - Diving - Kayaking - Helicopter Scenic Flights - Croc & Wildlife Tours - Stunning Beaches - Rainforest tracks 

Located centrally to 14km of golden Mission Beach sands and island views,Scotty's Mission Beach is equipped with all you need to make the most of
your Mission Beach experience. A glistening 20 meter swimming pool takes center stage in a lush green setting, sweeping through the grounds of the resort. The perfect mixture of Modern facilities with the relaxed and beach-side feel that we all dream of.

groupInformation.terms:
Guests are required, at all times, to follow the rules of the hostel and general hostel etiquette or will be requested to leave the property immediately with no refund.
Check-out 10am, Pool closes at 10PM, Any anti-social behaviour will not be tolerated at any time, excessive alcohol consumption not permitted.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Cancellation made more than 14 days in advance will be free of charge (not including Hostelworld.com deposit).
Cancellation made more than 7 days but less that 14 days in advance will forfeit the cost of the first night (for all of the group).
Cancellation made more than 3 days but less than 7 nights in advance will forfeit the cost of the first two nights (for all of the group).
Cancellations made with less than 72 hours notice will be liable to cover the cost of the entire booking and the credit card provided may be charged accordingly.
Options for a non-refundable deposit possibly available upon request.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: Please inform in advance if separate payments are to be made upon arrival for remaining balance of bookings.

houseRules.notes:
Valid photo I.D - $10 Cash Key Deposit - Smiles all due upon check-in.
Reception 7.30AM-11.30AM & 3.30PM-7.30PM.
48 Hour Cancellation Policy with all accommodation bookings - All cancellations to be received by the hostel at least 48 hours in advance of the arrival date.
Groups bookings (6 or more people) To Call after booking for further instruction - Group cancellation policies differ.
No discounts available on remaining balance due upon check-in.

Due to the shared nature of the facilities at properties, may require all guests to provide proof of vaccination. A safe stay is our top priority so we have enhanced hygiene measures in place, along with social distancing practices.
